statements.select:
SELECT AA.ADDRESS_ID , AA.POST_NO , AA.ZONE_NO , AA.ADDRESS1 , AA.ADDRESS2 , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UCD.ADDRESS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.POST_NO LIKE #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.ZONE_NO LIKE #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.ADDRESS1 LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.ADDRESS2 LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' )
AND AA.ADDRESS_ID = #ADDRESS_ID#
ORDER BY AA.ADDRESS_ID
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UCD.ADDRESS ( POST_NO, ZONE_NO, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #POST_NO#, #ZONE_NO#, #ADDRESS1#, #ADDRESS2#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ADDRESS_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UCD.ADDRESS SET POST_NO = #POST_NO# , ZONE_NO = #ZONE_NO# , ADDRESS1 = #ADDRESS1# , ADDRESS2 = #ADDRESS2# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ADDRESS_ID = #ADDRESS_ID#
statements.select: SELECT AA.ADDRESS_ID FROM UCD.ADDRESS AA WHERE AA.ADDRESS_ID = #ADDRESS_ID#
